title: Phwoar and Peace
description: War has come to Withernsea…  The foretold prophecy is unfolding upon the residents of Withernsea after an old enemy returns. His plan... to destroy his adversaries so he can once again rule—and ruin—the lives of the people who live there.  Charlie Landry has no choice but to take her rightful place as Queen, and fight for Withernsea’s freedom. But all she wants is for all this battle to be over, so she can live happily ever after with merman Kai, who she knows is her destiny. Between her nemesis; and her over-protective father, Theo; she’s getting increasingly frustrated… in more ways than one.  With her family and friends at her side, can Charlie defeat the enemy and bring lasting peace to Withernsea? She’s certainly going to have a devil of a time trying…
author: Andie M. Long
